arg.name: joint_limit_params
arg.doc: YAML file containing the joint limit values

arg.name: kinematics_params
arg.doc: YAML file containing the robot's kinematic parameters. These will be different for each robot as they contain the robot's calibration.

arg.name: physical_params
arg.doc: YAML file containing the phycical parameters of the robot

arg.name: visual_params
arg.doc: YAML file containing the visual model of the robot

arg.name: transmission_hw_interface
arg.doc: The hardware_interface to expose for each joint in the simulated robot (one of: [PositionJointInterface, VelocityJointInterface, EffortJointInterface])

param.name: robot_description
param.command: $(find xacro)/xacro '$(find robotiq_gazebo)/urdf/robotiq_3f.xacro' prefix:=$(arg prefix) joint_limit_params:=$(arg joint_limit_params) physical_params:=$(arg physical_params) visual_params:=$(arg visual_params) transmission_hw_interface:=$(arg transmission_hw_interface)
